MAN.TITLE: show_pixmap
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: send the pixmap buffer to the screen

DESCRIPTION.SP: If a graphic window pixmap property is "on" the drawings are send to a pixmap memory instead of the screen display.
The show_pixmap() instruction send the pixmap to the screen.
The pixmap mode can be used to obtain smooth animations. This property can be found among the figure entity fields (see figure_properties).
